      • Class GUI.GUIOptions

        class GUIOptions extends JDialog implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • boardSize
            Integer boardSize
          • darkColors
            Color[] darkColors
          • darkPiecesColor
            Color darkPiecesColor
          • darkSquaresColor
            Color darkSquaresColor
          • lightColors
            Color[] lightColors
          • lightPiecesColor
            Color lightPiecesColor
          • lightSquaresColor
            Color lightSquaresColor
            Most of the attributes are self-explanatory sizeCheck is assigned from the height of the game board calling this class and is set as a class-wide variable so the board doesn't need to be passed around as much. It's sole use is for determining which radio button should be pre-selected in the board sizing panel.
          • sizeCheck
            int sizeCheck
